about_the_game:
※ This content includes items that are already included in other products. Please confirm before purchasing to avoid duplication.
※ Due to product attributes, this DLC does not include the Reverse Collapse: Code Name Bakery OST. The soundtrack can be purchased separately.

【Digital Artbook】
The digital artbook is in PDF format, spanning 70 pages. After installation, please access it at the following path: steamapps\common\Reverse Collapse Code Name Bakery\artbook

【In-Game Item Bundle】
Provided by the Antarctic Union, this special supply bundle offers additional reinforcements for agents during different phases in their journeys, instilling courage at critical forks in destiny.
※ The item bundle is distributed once per chapter during the preparation phase and once when entering all branch endings in Chapter Four.

【Antarctic Union Gala Attire】
Prepare to attend the most prestigious commendation gala in style. Dress to impress with your favorite glamorous attire.
  • Evening Gown (Jefuty)
  • Crimson Dress (Jefuty)
  • Evening Suit (Mondo)
  • Standard Coat (Atena)
  • Dinner Suit (Carl)
  • Evening Jacket (Jevon)
  • Secret Gown (???)

cadpa.descriptors: 本游戏适用于12周岁及以上的用户

short_description: Players who purchase the base version can upgrade by purchasing the DLCs: "Deluxe Edition Upgrade Pack" and "Reverse Collapse: Code Name Bakery OST" separately (DLC not included in the launch discount).
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
